TASK: Craft an item of type: blackstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 40, "index": 18}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a blackstone wall, I need to place 6 blackstone in a 2x3 grid in the crafting table. Since there are 6 blackstone at slot 11, I will first move 1 of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
